title: Sorrowful Legend of Kanashi Village - Novel Updates
author: Mibuichirou   壬生一郎
description:
The legend of Kanashi Village is thoroughly sorrowful. The single, lonely Bear is killed by a middle-aged hunter. A crying girl who lost her mother falls off a waterfall and dies. The ghost of the mother who was looking for her child, learns of that the child had died and places a deadly curse on the villagers.

A strong-willed yet truly kind witch watches and tries her best to change the story.>
